message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price accordingly?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
